summary: Members of a music band spending summer in the countryside watch the petty dramas play out among the local folks and among themselves.
cast: Nana Ioseliani|Tamar Gabarashvili|Mikhail Naneishvili|Nukri Davitashvili|Baia Matsaberidze|Rezo Charkhalashvili|Nestor Pipia|Qsenia Pipia|Vaxtang Eremashvili|Lia Jugeli|Pavle Kantaria|Marina Kartsivadze|Leri Zardiashvili
title: Pastorali
